file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
# Converted from https://apidoc.rwlabs.org/swagger.yaml (swagger: "2.0")
# using https://mermade.org.uk/openapi-converter to OpenAPI 3.0
# on 2021-05-08. No manual review yet

openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: The ReliefWeb API
  description: Interactive API documentation for the data API of Reliefweb.int. ReliefWeb
    is a leading source of information on global crises and disasters.


    Our continuous coverage and archive going back to the 1970s makes ReliefWeb
    an unparalleled resource for both current and historical data on
    humanitarian response.

    The vast majority of content on ReliefWeb has
    been contributed by humanitarian partners. We owe it to the community to
    make data more accessible and reusable, so that developers can build tools
    that increase exposure for valuable content and facilitate analysis for
    better decisions.
  termsOfService: https://apidoc.rwlabs.org/#tos
  version: v1
  contact:
    url: https://reliefweb.int/contact
    email: api@reliefweb.int
  license:
    name: Creative Commons Zero - Public Domain
    url: http://creativecommons.org/about/cc0
tags:
  - name: Discovery
    description: Versions and main endpoints.
    externalDocs:
      description: RWApi docs.
      url: https://apidoc.rwlabs.org
  - name: Reports
    description: Gateway to updates and analysis from more than 4,000 global information
      sources.
    externalDocs:
      description: RWApi docs.
      url: https://apidoc.rwlabs.org
  - name: Jobs
    description: Humanitarian job listings.
    externalDocs:
      description: RWApi docs.
      url: https://apidoc.rwlabs.org
  - name: Training
    description: Humanitarian training opportunities and courses.
    externalDocs:
      description: RWApi docs.
      url: https://apidoc.rwlabs.org
  - name: Countries
    description: Countries covered by ReliefWeb.
    externalDocs:
      description: RWApi docs.
      url: https://apidoc.rwlabs.org
  - name: Disasters
    description: Disasters covered by ReliefWeb.
    externalDocs:
      description: RWApi docs.
      url: https://apidoc.rwlabs.org
  - name: Sources
    description: Organizations providing content to ReliefWeb.
    externalDocs:
      description: RWApi docs.
      url: https://apidoc.rwlabs.org
paths:
  /../:
    get:
      tags:
        - Discovery
      description: Review location and status of all versions.
      operationId: discoveryVersions
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success.
  /:
    get:
      tags:
        - Discovery
      description: Review list of main entrypoints and top-level resources.
      operationId: discoveryResources
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success.
  /reports:
    get:
      tags:
        - Reports
      summary: |
        List or search updates, headlines or maps.
      description: ""
      operationId: getReports
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/query_value_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/query_operator_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/query_fields_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_field_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_value_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_operator_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_negate_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_conditions_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_field_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_name_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_limit_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_sort_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_filter_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_interval_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/fields_include_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/fields_exclude_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/limit"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/offset"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/sortArray"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/profile"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/preset"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Report"
        "400":
          description: Unexpected value
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/error"
    post:
      tags:
        - Reports
      summary: |
        List or search updates, headlines or maps.
      description: |
        

      operationId: searchReports
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/post-params"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Report"
        "400":
          description: Unexpected value
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/error"
  "/reports/{reportId}":
    get:
      tags:
        - Reports
      summary: Find report by its unique ID
      description: |
        Individual reports.
      operationId: getReportById
      parameters:
        - description: The identifier of the report.
          in: path
          name: reportId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/profile"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/fields_include_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/fields_exclude_Array"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Report fields
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Report"
        "404":
          description: Not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/error"
  /jobs:
    get:
      tags:

      summary: |
        List or search humanitarian job offers.
      description: ""
      operationId: getJobs

        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/query_fields_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_field_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_value_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_operator_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_negate_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_conditions_Array"

        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/fields_exclude_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/limit"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/offset"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/sortArray"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/profile"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/preset"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Job"
        "400":
          description: Unexpected value
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/error"
    post:
      tags:
        - Jobs
      summary: |
        List or search humanitarian job offers.
      description: >
        
      operationId: searchJobs
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/post-params"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Job"
        "400":
          description: Unexpected value
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/error"
  "/jobs/{jobId}":
    get:
      tags:
        - Jobs
      summary: Find job by its unique ID

      operationId: getJobById
      parameters:
        - description: The identifier of the job.

        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/profile"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/fields_include_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/fields_exclude_Array"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Job fields
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Job"
        "404":
          description: Not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/error"

    get:
      tags:
        - Training
      summary: |
        List or search humanitarian learning opportunities.
      description: ""

      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/query_value_"

        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/query_fields_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_field_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_value_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_operator_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_negate_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_conditions_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_field_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_name_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_limit_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_sort_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_filter_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_interval_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/fields_include_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/fields_exclude_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/limit"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/offset"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/sortArray"

        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/preset"

          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Training"
        "400":
          description: Unexpected value
          content:

              schema:

    post:
      tags:

      summary: |
        List or search humanitarian learning opportunities.
      description: ""
      operationId: searchTraining
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/post-params"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Training"
        "400":
          description: Unexpected value
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/error"
  "/training/{trainingId}":
    get:
      tags:

      summary: Find training by its unique ID

      operationId: getTrainingById
      parameters:

        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_field_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_value_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_operator_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_negate_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_conditions_Array"

        "400":
          description: Unexpected value

              schema:

        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/profile"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/fields_include_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/fields_exclude_Array"
      responses:

          content:

        "404":

  /disasters:
    get:
      tags:

      summary: |
        List or search disasters covered by ReliefWeb.
      description: ""
      operationId: getDisasters
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/query_value_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/query_operator_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/query_fields_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_field_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_value_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_operator_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_negate_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_conditions_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_field_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_name_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_limit_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_sort_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_filter_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_interval_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/fields_include_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/fields_exclude_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/limit"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/offset"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/sortArray"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/profile"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/preset"
      responses:

          description: Success
          content:

              schema:

        "400":
          description: Unexpected value
          content:

    post:
      tags:

      summary: |
        List or search disasters covered by ReliefWeb.
      description: ""
      operationId: searchDisasters
      requestBody:

      responses:
        "200":

          content:

        "400":
          description: Unexpected value
          content:

  "/disasters/{disasterId}":
    get:
      tags:

      operationId: getDisasterById

        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/profile"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/fields_include_Array"

  /sources:
    get:

        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/query_fields_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_field_"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_value_Array"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/filter_operator_"

        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_limit_"

        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/facets_filter_Array"

        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/profile"

      operationId: getSourceById

servers:
  - url: http://api.reliefweb.int/v1
  - url: https://api.reliefweb.int/v1
components:
  parameters:
    limit:
      description: >
        The maximum number of items to return for a list query. The default is
        10 and the maximum 1000.
      in: query
      name: limit
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
        format: int64
        minimum: 1
        maximum: 1000
        default: 10
    offset:
      description: >
        The offset from which to return the items in a list query. Allows paging
        through all results. The default is 0.
      in: query
      name: offset
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
        format: int64
        minimum: 0
        default: 0
    profile:
      description: >
        Pre-built standard selections of fields to return for ease of displaying
        lists or items.
      in: query
      name: profile
      schema:
        type: string
        enum:
          - full
          - list
          - minimal
    preset:
      description: >
        Pre-built standard configurations of queries, filters and sorts for
        common use cases.
      in: query
      name: preset
      schema:
        type: string
        enum:
          - analysis
          - latest
          - minimal
    fields_include_Array:
      description: >
        Specify which fields to include for each item. Defaults to an item label.
      in: query
      name: fields[include][]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: array
        items:
          type: string
    fields_exclude_Array:
      description: >
        Specify sub-fields to exclude from overall results. For example, if you
        include date you may exclude date.changed.
      in: query
      name: fields[exclude][]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: array
        items:
          type: string
    query_value_:
      description: |
        Specify the terms of your fuzzy search. The default is no query.
      in: query
      name: query[value]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
    query_operator_:
      description: |
        Specify the operator by which your search query words will be combined.
      in: query
      name: query[operator]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
        enum:
          - AND
          - OR
    query_fields_Array:
      description: >
        Specify which fields to target with your search. You may use boost
        syntax here, see the Advanced API Usage documentation.
      in: query
      name: query[fields][]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: array
        items:
          type: string
    filter_field_:
      description: >
        Field to filter by. Every condition must contain either a
        field or conditions property.
      in: query
      name: filter[field]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
    filter_value_Array:
      description: >
        Value for the field being filtered. Leave blank to require existence of
        the field, must be present for range and value
        conditions.
      in: query
      name: filter[value][]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: array
        items:
          type: string
    filter_operator_:
      description: |
        Operator by which filters will be combined.
      in: query
      name: filter[operator]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
        enum:
          - AND
          - OR
    filter_negate_:
      description: |
        Reverse the filter to include those items that do not match.
      in: query
      name: filter[negate]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: boolean
    filter_conditions_Array:
      description: >
        This property is used to combine conditions with a logical connector
        (the operator property). Every condition must contain one
        of the field or conditions properties.
      in: query
      name: filter[conditions][]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: array
        items:
          type: string
    facets_field_:
      description: |
        Field to facet by. May include dates, references or the status field.
      in: query
      name: facets[field]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
    facets_name_:
      description: >
        Identifier for resulting facet data. Useful when faceting multiple ways
        on the same field.
      in: query
      name: facets[name]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
    facets_limit_:
      description: |
        Limit the number of facets returned for non-date based facets.
      in: query
      name: facets[limit]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
    facets_sort_:
      description: >
        The sort order of non-date facets. Sorting may be by value
        or count of terms, and ascending or descending.
        count defaults to desc, value
        defaults to asc.
      in: query
      name: facets[sort]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
    facets_filter_Array:
      description: >
        Apply all the same capabilities of the filter parameter to the specific
        results of this facet request.
      in: query
      name: facets[filter][]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: array
        items:
          type: string
    facets_interval_:
      description: >
        Round date information to the nearest interval unit.

        Apply all the same capabilities of the filter parameter to the specific results of this facet request.
      in: query
      name: facets[interval]
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
        enum:
          - year
          - month
          - week
          - day
    sortArray:
      description: >
        Sort the list results. Defaults to search relevance. Values in the form
        of fieldname:(asc|desc).
      in: query
      name: sort[]
      required: false

        "facets[filter][]-post":
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/facets_filter_Array-post"
        "facets[interval]-post":
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/facets_interval_-post"
        "fields[include][]":
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/fields_include_Array-post"
        "fields[exclude][]":
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/fields_exclude_Array-post"
        "sort[]-post":
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/sortArray-post"
        limit-post:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/limit-post"
        offset-post:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/offset-post"
        profile:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/profile-post"
        preset-post:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/preset-post"
    limit-post:
      description: >
        The maximum number of items to return for a list query. The default is
        10 and the maximum 1000.
      default: 10
      format: int64
      maximum: 1000
      minimum: 1
      type: integer
    offset-post:
      default: 0
      description: >
        The offset from which to return the items in a list query. Allows paging
        through all results. The default is 0.
      format: int64
      minimum: 0
      type: integer
    preset-post:
      description: >
        Pre-built standard configurations of queries, filters and sorts for
        common use cases.
      enum:
        - analysis
        - latest
        - minimal
      type: string
    profile-post:
      enum:
        - full
        - list
        - minimal
      type: string
    query_value_-post:
      description: |
        Specify the terms of your fuzzy search. The default is no query.
      type: string
    query_operator_-post:
      description: |
        Specify the operator by which your search query words will be combined.
      enum:
        - AND
        - OR
      type: string
    query_fields_Array-post:
      description: >
        Specify which fields to target with your search. You may use boost
        syntax here, see the Advanced API Usage documentation.
      type: array
      items:
        type: string
    fields_include_Array-post:
      description: |
        Fields to include for each item.
      items:
        type: string
      type: array
    fields_exclude_Array-post:
      description: >
        Sub-fields to exclude from results. For example, if you include
        date you may exclude date.changed.
      items:
        type: string
      type: array
    filter_field_-post:
      description: >
        Field to filter by. Every condition must contain either a
        field or conditions property.
      type: string
    filter_value_Array-post:
      description: >
        Value for the field being filtered. Leave blank to require existence of
        the field, must be present for range and value
        conditions.
      items:
        type: string
      type: array
    filter_operator_-post:
      description: |
        Operator by which filters will be combined.
      enum:
        - AND
        - OR
      type: string
    filter_negate_-post:
      description: |
        Reverse the filter to include those items that do not match.
      type: boolean
    filter_conditions_Array-post:
      description: >
        This property is used to combine conditions with a logical connector
        (the operator property). Every condition must contain one
        of the field or conditions properties.
      items:
        type: string
      type: array
    facets_field_-post:
      description: |
        Field to facet by. May include dates, references or the status field.
      type: string
    facets_name_-post:
      description: >
        Identifier for resulting facet data. Useful when faceting multiple ways
        on the same field.
      type: string
    facets_limit_-post:
      description: |
        Limit the number of facets returned for non-date based facets.
      type: integer
      format: int64
    facets_sort_-post:
      description: >
        The sort order of non-date facets. Sorting may be by value
        or count of terms, and ascending or descending.
        count defaults to desc, value
        defaults to asc.
      type: string
    facets_filter_Array-post:
      description: >
        Apply all the same capabilities of the filter parameter to the specific
        results of this facet request.
      items:
        type: string
      type: array
    facets_interval_-post:
      description: >
        Round date information to the nearest interval unit.

        Apply all the same capabilities of the filter parameter to the specific results of this facet request.
      enum:
        - year
        - month
        - week
        - day
      type: string
    sortArray-post:
      description: >
        Sort the list results. Defaults to search relevance. Values in the form
        of fieldname:(asc|desc).
      items:
        type: string
      type: array
